topics.body:
Do any of you remember that article from awhile back? It was either on Polygon or Kotaku, one of those shit rags.
Basically it said that beating a female in a video game was akin to raping them.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400a8ce6368722133480200#post_5400a8ce6368722133480200
....What the fuck?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400a94763687208e7d10000#post_5400a94763687208e7d10000
Oh yeah. You didn't read that? It was probably one of worst articles I have ever read on Video Games. Full of non-facts, exaggerations, and outright lies. It tried to argue that rape means overpowering someone and that when girls lose it promotes rape culture.
Is it any wonder why _Game Journalism_ is under so much scrutiny right now?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400a8ce6368722133480200#post_5400a8ce6368722133480200
...Sooo, Raiden was raping Mistral all the time?
